question: The Qutb Shahis ruled the kingdom of Golconda ruled during which of the following periods?
explanation: The Qutb Shahis ruled the kingdom of Golconda starting from 1518 to 1687 CE.Â  Sultan Quli Harnadani in the Bahmani kingdom, rose in position and was rechristened Khawas Khan and conferred the title of Qutb-ul Mulk.
